description:
Clash of Mages is tactical game built around mage duels. Nice graphics, atmospheric music, simple rules and endless gameplay!

Stand against AI opponents, try to defeat other players online or play with your friends and family on a single device, anyway you'll have a lot of fun! You can even play against players from all mobile platforms.

Game features:
- Online Multiplayer with Top 100 Leaderboard
- Achievements system
- Multiplayer on a single device
- Single player campaign
- Quick battles with 3 difficulty levels
- Advanced tactical AI
- Simple & easy to use magic system (no long manuals needed)

Check Clash of Mages official website if you want to know more about game rules.
http://www.clashofmages.com
